posts.post_content:

Check / Postal M.O. / Paypal are fine as payment.

Unglaub  SGC 30  Polar Bear (faint wrinkle in right upper corner)  $34

Stahl (glove shows)  SGC 30  Polar Bear (multiple creases & wrinkles)  $30

Berger SGC 40  Polar Bear  (small crease near left lower corner)  $42

Miller  SGC 40  Sweet Cap. 350 f#30 ( no creases or wrinkles)  $42 


Post or PM me.

Thanks

Jantz
